item.title: Citrix Patches Exploited NetScaler Zero-Day
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Zero-day exploited in the wild forces Citrix and CISA to push emergency patch deadlines for federal agencies.

The post Citrix Patches Exploited NetScaler Zero-Day appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: PromptLock: First AI-Powered Ransomware Emerges
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Proof-of-concept ransomware uses AI models to generate attack scripts in real time.

The post PromptLock: First AI-Powered Ransomware Emerges appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Beyond the Prompt: Building Trustworthy Agent Systems
item.dc:creator: Stu Sjouwerman
item.description:
Building secure AI agent systems requires a disciplined engineering approach focused on deliberate architecture and human oversight.

The post Beyond the Prompt: Building Trustworthy Agent Systems appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Healthcare Services Group Data Breach Impacts 624,000
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
The personal information of many individuals was stolen from Healthcare Services Groupâ€™s computer systems in 2024.

The post Healthcare Services Group Data Breach Impacts 624,000 appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Docker Desktop Vulnerability Leads to Host Compromise
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
A critical vulnerability in Docker Desktop allows attackers to modify the filesystem of Windows hosts to become administrators.

The post Docker Desktop Vulnerability Leads to Host Compromise appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: AI Systems Vulnerable to Prompt Injection via Image Scaling Attack
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Researchers show how popular AI systems can be tricked into processing malicious instructions by hiding them in images.

The post AI Systems Vulnerable to Prompt Injection via Image Scaling Attack appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Hundreds of Thousands Affected by Auchan Data Breach
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Auchan confirms that the personal information of hundreds of thousands of customers was stolen in a data breach.

The post Hundreds of Thousands Affected by Auchan Data Breach appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Organizations Warned of Exploited Git Vulnerability
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
CISA urges federal agencies to immediately patch an exploited arbitrary file write vulnerability in Git that leads to remote code execution.

The post Organizations Warned of Exploited Git Vulnerability appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: FTC Calls on Tech Firms to Resist Foreign Anti-Encryption Demands
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
Tech giants have received a letter from the FTC urging them not to weaken security and privacy at the request of foreign governments.

The post FTC Calls on Tech Firms to Resist Foreign Anti-Encryption Demands appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: OneFlip: An Emerging Threat to AI that Could Make Vehicles Crash and Facial Recognition Fail
item.dc:creator: Kevin Townsend
item.description:
Researchers unveil OneFlip, a Rowhammer-based attack that flips a single bit in neural network weights to stealthily backdoor AI systems without degrading performance.

The post OneFlip: An Emerging Threat to AI that Could Make Vehicles Crash and Facial Recognition Fail appeared first on SecurityWeek.
